text: Adam Baumann (27 March 1948 - 6 September 2021) was a Polish actor. He was born in Grudziądz, Poland. His career began in 1967. His best known movie roles were in Śmierć jak kromka chleba (1994), Wojaczek (1999) and Destined for Blues (2005). Baumann died on 6 September 2021 in Katowice, Poland at the age of 73.Mort de Jean-Paul Belmondo, le Magnifique du cinéma français ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish stage actors
title: Adam Baumann
